name: Wolf
description: Wolves are cunning predators that work together to take down prey. They are known for their loyalty to their pack and their sharp senses. Wolves are often found in forests or mountainous regions, where they hunt in packs. Their keen sense of smell, hearing, and speed make them formidable hunters.
languages: Understands Common and Sylvan but cannot speak.
special: Pack Tactics: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isnâ€™t incapacitated.
